ext_weather.name: Today
ext_weather.shortForecast: Mostly Cloudy then Chance Showers And Thunderstorms
ext_weather.detailedForecast: A chance of showers and thunderstorms after 3pm. Mostly cloudy, with a high near 47. South wind 5 to 10 mph. Chance of precipitation is 50%. New rainfall amounts less than a tenth of an inch possible.
